meanings.definition: Relating to a polymer chain in which all the side groups are on the same side of the chain.
meanings.sent1: The isotactic polymer had all its side groups on one side, making it very organized.
meanings.sent2: The scientist observed the isotactic structure of the polymer under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The isotactic polymer was so tidy that even the other molecules were jealous of its neatness.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were isotactic, neatly arranged in a row like the side groups in a polymer chain.
meanings.sent5: The isotactic arrangement of the molecules resembled soldiers standing in perfect formation.
